\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w portion|strong="H4490"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w measure|strong="H4055"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.
